question: A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter • tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves• say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her• explain how to apply for the job
text: I hope this letter finds you well.I am writing this with regards to the help you about find a job.As you know, I have been working in a well-noun company in my hometown as an expert and I am used to outlying time to find a new job for my family and best friend every time.Fortunately, our company need three experts with a good salary and nice well-paid  and you can apply for this business and I promise you that I help you to get also I am sure this career is the best work for you because I realise you very well and I had always been spending time with you when we are students.As a result,I believe you can succeed in this work.Moreover,this work involves working with laptops and analysing our income. I know you have different personalities and behaviour so I think the job would be suitable for you.

In conclusion, I should say if you want to apply for this business you have to go to the main site company and fill out the application form and do not forget to reply to me because I can talk to my boss about you and I will aid you.
